winstan charchil - wikipidiya thanathura eksath rajadhaniye agamathi thanathure siti kalaya 1951okthombar 26 sita 1955 aprel 07 dakwa niyojyaya anthoni eedn pera sitiye klemant athli pasuwa sitiye anthoni eedn thanathure siti kalaya 1940 mayi masa 10 weni dina sita 1945 juli masa 27 dakwa pera sitiye newil chamibarleyin pasuwa sitiye klemant atli thanathura rajakiya bhandagara adhyakshaka thanathure siti kalaya 1924 nowambar 06 sita 1929 juni 04 dakwa agamathi stanli boldwin pera sitiye pihilip snowudan pasuwa sitiye pihilip snowudan thanathura paksha lekam thanathure siti kalaya 1910 pebarawari masa 19 sita 1911 okthombar 24 dakwa agamathi harbat henri eskwith pera sitiye harbat gladstorn pasuwa sitiye rejinold makkena upatha 1874 nowambar masa 30 wani dina, engalanthaye, bilenhem, oksfordshayar hidi wipatha 1965 janawari masa 24 wana dina (wayasa awu : 90) landanaye hayid parkhidi.

podi kale idanma mama rupawahiniyata abbahi wuna kenek neweyi.ee kaleth mama aasa kale wadipurama kiyawannayi liyannayi thamayi.rupawahinniyata abbahi nowenna pradhanama hethuwa thama ee kale thaththa apita panawala thibuna waranaya.ra aten passe kawadawath eya apita tiwi balanna dunne na.ee dawaswala ookata samahara welawata thaththa ekka hith amanapen hitiyath adanam hithenawa ehema una eka hodayi kiyala.mokada ookata abbahiwela hitiyanam ada wenakota yana mega kachal tika balanna mama welawa kohen hoyannada appa.
